topic.title: Issues with site creation
topic.body:
Something strange just happened to my last blog, so it didn't let me update it anymore. I've tried to create a new one, but apparentely, it cannot be viewed by anyone else but me.

This message appears when I try to publish my new blog.

"No peers found, but your content is ready to access."

When I give the blog's address to some friend, it shows the "there are no peers" message.

My site link is this:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/19KdvvYVFWuNPHQ2t8KVPtyS4jDUn19QKo

PS: I've downloaded the new version of zeronet via wget and then I deleted the last folder and created a new one by extracting the tar file just on the same location last folder of zeronet-master was. Did I do anything wrong?

I apreciate your answers.

1_1PGFKCfMSL1QdudndfYCo4mGM8E8XKzMMG.body: Thanks! it works now, I couldn't figure out what the problem was, but the site have peers now. o.O
